short_summary: Consultative services of a Optometrist for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program
full_summary:
# [PSIB - Policy Review and Development Support for Vision Care, Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29157/1000242999_rfp.pdf)

## Tender Details

*   ** Tender Reference:** #cb-735-98676096
*   ** Amendment Number:** 6
*   ** Solicitation Number:** 1000242999
*   ** Publication Date:** 10 January 2024
*   ** Tender Closing Date:** 20 February 2024 14:00:00
*   ** Expected Contract Start Date:** 1 April 2024
*   ** Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2027

## Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to award a contract for consultative services of an optometrist for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) program. The services will be provided on an as-and-when-required basis for a three-year period, followed by up to three one-year option periods.

## Contract Documents and Attachments

All tender documents and attachments are available for download from the procurement platform [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The attachments include:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29157/1000242999_rfpv2.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29157/1000242999_rfp.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29157/1000242999_qa.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29157/mseac-tor-final.pdf

## About the Request for Proposal (RFP)

Canada's Indigenous Services Canada is issuing this RFP for cooperation reasons as per the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). The request is open to companies based in the services sector category. The contract is contemplated for at least 3 years with possible 3 one-year pick-up extensions.

## More Information

*   **Trade Agreement:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   **Tendering Method:** Competitive
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
